name: You Must Build A Ship
description:
Tenshi has issued a new decree from heaven: ALL FLIGHT HAS BEEN BANNED!?! No! This will not do! 

In this game you control Suika as she combines forces with other iconic Touhou characters to build a flying ship so that they can ascend to heaven and get back their flight!

Controls

  • Z to Begin the game, Confirm  and Talk
  • Arrow Keys for Movement
  • X to skip dialog or leave Menus
  • Escape to Pause the game
  • Feel free to skip levels using the pause menu

Tutorial

Rescue the girl in each level. The orbs and books will restart the level if you touch them. The keystones can be pushed into the books and orbs to destroy them. If You get stuck on a level feel free to skip it.  To start the levels talk to Kisume.

The HTML version can get stuck if your not selecting it, you can click on the window to fix this. Also if you have windows the downloaded version runs better.

  • Red Books destroy 4 keystones before disappearing
  • Orange books 3 keystones before disappearing
  • Green books 2 keystones before disappearing
  • Blue books take 1 keystone before disappearing
  • The lock disappears when all red books are gone.

Credits

  • The_crawling_chaos, programing and levels
  • Zecerman, all art assets (https://www.deviantart.com/zecerman)
